summary: WorkflowStub methods except getResult don't properly map GRPC errors to Temporal exceptions. The cancel method and others throw generic ServiceClientException instead of domain-specific exceptions like WorkflowNotFoundException.
userImpact: Users cannot reliably catch workflow-specific exceptions from most WorkflowStub methods, making error handling inconsistent and difficult.
rootCause: mapWorkflowFailureToException is only called in getResult method, not applied uniformly across all WorkflowStub methods
proposedFix: Apply mapWorkflowFailureToException to all WorkflowStub methods that interact with GRPC
keyQuote: all methods of the WorkflowStub class, except for the getResult method, don't properly map errors from GRPC
